sourcesContent: import { motion } from "framer-motion"; import Backdrop from "./backdrop"; const dropIn = { hidden: { y: "-100vh", opacity: 0, }, visible: { y: "0", opacity: 1, transition: { duration: 0.1, type: "spring", damping: 25, stiffness: 500, }, }, exit: { y: "100vh", opacity: 0, }, }; const Modal = ({ handleClose }) => { return ( e.stopPropagation()} className="modal orange-gradient" variants={dropIn} initial="hidden" animate="visible" exit="exit" > Username Password Email First Name Last Name Phone Gender Address ); }; export default Modal;
